data.name: HyperCore Demo
data.detailed_description:
Travel through hyperspace and fight dangerous hazards generated by the music. Will you make it out alive?




HyperCore is a “Rhythm bullet hell”, mixing the frenetic action of classic bullet hell shoot'em up with semi-procedurally generated encounters based on the music.
Survive by avoiding the countless obstacles sent towards them by the core in sync with the music.




This demo contains 2 Single Player Score Attack Levels :

  • HyperNova - song : Spies by Dustin Crenna : Fight against an unstable star.
  • Hierophant - song : Skirmish by Dustin Crenna : Fight Hypernova's regulating AI turned insane

data.short_description: HyperCore is a “Rhythm bullet hell”, mixing the frenetic action of classic bullet hell shoot'em up with semi-procedurally generated encounters based on the music.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3320M 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 - 650 3.20Ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX660 or superior
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
